Text: This series was actually written for kids, and it shows. It is good for its target audience but not for serious sci-fi buffs...too many oversights.

I did like it. I get my scifi  ration where I can ;)

Get the rest of the DVDrip here if you want it:D

http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3641906/Primeval_S01_DVDRip_XviD
It's the same version for ep. 6
